name: Kra-Ken
detailed_description:
Fight in intense, 1-on-1 battles with your friends! Kra-Ken is a 2.5D fighting game that will make you grip your controller ever more tightly as you beat your opponent.

Kra-Ken aims to emulate our own view of the Street Fighter legacy, and pay homage to the many years of inspiration and joy it has brought by putting a twist on the existing formula. Experience the two unique characters and stages as envisioned by DGTL Dojo.

Features

  • 2 Unique Characters
    Fight as Fabio, the handsome, mustache wielding brawler, or Dehlila, the beautiful and quick dancer!
  • Local Multiplayer
    Play with your friends on the same machine!
  • Extensive Training Mode [Under Construction]
    Do you need to get to grips with the basics? Want to practice that amazing combo you found? Wait, did that really hit me? The training mode will help you find answers to the questions in a no-pressure environment where you can set the training dummy to do what you need it to do. This feature is currently being developed. It is available in an incomplete state.
  • VS AI gameplay [Under Construction]
    If you just want to get away from your friends for a little, try your hand at beating the AI. This feature is currently being developed. It is available in an incomplete state.
  • Online Multiplayer [Planned]
    Connect with your friends over the internet and challenge them, regardless of where you are. This feature is currently being developed, and is planned to be implemented in a later update.

short_description: Fight in intense, 1-on-1 battles with your friends! Kra-Ken is a 2.5D fighting game that will make you grip your controller ever more tightly as you beat your opponent.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950m
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
